strings.error_403_desc: You do not have sufficient privileges to access the resource you requested.
strings.error_404_desc: The resource you requested cannot be found.
strings.error_413_desc: The upload threshold has been exceeded. You may only upload files that do not exceed 10MB in size.
strings.error_503_desc: The server is currently unable to handle your request due to temporary maintenance. Please wait 10 seconds and reload.
